scene_description: Astronaut discovering alien artifact on Mars

structured_prompt.short_description: Astronaut stands at the threshold of a groundbreaking discovery on Mars, surrounded by a surreal landscape and an ominous alien artifact

objects.description: Astronaut in a sleek, metallic spacesuit with a gold-tinted visor, standing at the edge of a massive, ancient structure
objects.location: Center-left, with the Martian landscape stretching out to the right and the alien artifact looming in the background
objects.relationship: The astronaut is the central figure, with the landscape and artifact serving as a backdrop to their discovery
objects.relative_size: Small, emphasizing the vastness of the Martian terrain and the magnitude of the discovery
objects.shape_and_color: The astronaut's suit is a combination of metallic silvers and deep blacks, with the gold-tinted visor adding a touch of warmth and humanity
objects.texture: The suit's texture is smooth and metallic, with a subtle sheen that suggests advanced materials and technology
objects.appearance_details: The astronaut's suit is worn and weathered, with subtle scratches and scuffs that suggest a long and difficult journey
objects.pose: Standing upright, with a sense of awe and wonder, and a slight lean forward to emphasize their fascination with the artifact
objects.orientation: Facing the artifact, with their body angled slightly to the right to take in the full scope of the discovery

objects.description: Alien artifact, a massive, pulsing structure that dominates the background of the scene
objects.location: Background, looming over the astronaut and the Martian landscape
objects.relationship: The artifact is the central mystery of the scene, with the astronaut and the landscape serving as a backdrop to its power and significance
objects.relative_size: Large, emphasizing the magnitude and wonder of the discovery
objects.shape_and_color: The artifact is a combination of deep blues and purples, with pulsing, iridescent lights that suggest an otherworldly energy and power
objects.texture: The artifact's texture is smooth and glassy, with a subtle, organic curvature that suggests a living, breathing entity
objects.appearance_details: The artifact is covered in subtle, intricate patterns and markings, that suggest an advanced, alien technology
objects.pose: None, as it is an inanimate object
objects.orientation: Dominating the background, with its pulsing lights and energy drawing the viewer's eye

structured_prompt.background_setting: The Martian landscape, a vast, barren expanse of rust-red sand and rock, stretching out to the horizon and curving slightly to suggest the planet's curvature

lighting.conditions: A combination of soft, neutral light and cool, blue-purple background light, with subtle, warm accents to suggest the Martian sunset or the glow of the artifact
lighting.direction: 45° key light, positioned to the side of the astronaut to create a sense of depth and dimensionality, with a soft, diffused quality to enhance the textures and colors of the scene
lighting.shadow: Subtle, nuanced shadows that suggest the contours and textures of the Martian terrain and the astronaut's suit, with a medium to high contrast level to create a sense of depth and dimensionality

aesthetics.composition: Rule of thirds, positioning the astronaut and the artifact off-center to create a more dynamic composition, with the Martian landscape and the sky filling the rest of the frame
aesthetics.color_scheme: A muted blend of rust-reds, metallic silvers, and deep blues, with pulsing, iridescent accents to suggest the otherworldliness and surreal quality of the scene
aesthetics.mood_atmosphere: A sense of awe and wonder, combined with a sense of unease and mystery, as the astronaut encounters the alien artifact and the vast, barren expanse of the Martian landscape

photographic_characteristics.depth_of_field: Medium (f/4-8), ensuring that both the astronaut and the artifact are in focus, while the vast Martian landscape fades into the background
photographic_characteristics.focus: The astronaut and the artifact are in sharp focus, with a subtle, nuanced blur to suggest the distance and depth of the Martian landscape
photographic_characteristics.camera_angle: Eye-level, to emphasize the astronaut's perspective and create a sense of immediacy, while also allowing the viewer to fully absorb the enormity of the Martian landscape and the artifact
photographic_characteristics.lens_focal_length: 24mm, to match the wide shot type and provide an expansive view of the Martian terrain, the astronaut, and the alien artifact

structured_prompt.context: Concept for a sci-fi film, capturing the essence of a groundbreaking discovery on Mars and the sense of awe and wonder that comes with it

simple_prompt: Astronaut stands at the threshold of a groundbreaking discovery on Mars, surrounded by a surreal landscape and an ominous alien artifact. Camera: Eye-level, to emphasize the astronaut's perspective and create a sense of immediacy, while also allowing the viewer to fully absorb the enormity of the Martian landscape and the artifact. Lens: 24mm, to match the wide shot type and provide an expansive view of the Martian terrain, the astronaut, and the alien artifact. Lighting: A combination of soft, neutral light and cool, blue-purple background light, with subtle, warm accents to suggest the Martian sunset or the glow of the artifact
